data.body:
ask user if they want to mount existing local repo clones (you probalby do)
then ask if they want to search a specific directory or just manually specify
if specific directory use user home as default but allow override
and search user directory up to 2 levels deep for repos with beads
if manually make sure to verify paths as valid paths.
handle case wher repos are already mounted/registered, "the following clones are already mounted ...[list] ..., are there others? [y/N]
